src_original: Vin_17.217 / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
Vin_17.219 / pratītasamutpādasya sāmantake dvādaśāṅgasya /  Vin_17.220 / sarvasyānityatayā gra[sta]sya /
Vin_17.221 / ūrdhaṃ buddhasya śuklaṃ nirvāṇamaṇḍalam upadarśayet* /
Vin_17.222 / gāthayo[62a3]r ārabdham iti dvayor adhastāt* /
Vin_17.225 / prāsāde jātakānāṃ /  Vin_17.226 / mālādhārāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandhakuṭidvāre  Vin_17.227 upasthāpanaśālāyāṃ sthavirapaṃkteḥ /  Vin_17.228 / gan*jadvāre ṅkurahastānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ /
Vin_17.455 / spṛṣṭavadbhiḥ sacelasnānasya /  Vin_17.456 / anyair hastapādaprakṣālanaṃ /
Vin_17.460 / arhatvam asya pravrajitānāṃ kalyāṇa[ñ] cet* /
Vin_17.464 / phalaparimāṇaiḥ chatrair ekādhikair asya śravakānāṃ /
Vin_17.482 / siṃ*hadhvajo makaradhvajo nāgarājadhvajo vṛṣabhadhvaja iti /
Vin_17.483 / gahane pi karaṇaṃ /  Vin_17.484 / toraṇa[syo]t*[tsra]yaṇaṃ /
Vin_17.486 / stambhānāṃ gerikena lepanam* /  Vin_17.487 / bhittiḥ lākṣayā citraṇaṃ gandhābhiṣekadānam* /
Vin_17.489 / na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati /

Vin_17.491 / noparidīpadānaṃ āgārikaiṣpūjanārtham adhirohaṇam abhāve śramaṇodd[e]śaiṣpādo prakṣālya gandhodakena /  Vin_17.492 / na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
Vin_17.503 / ārghyeyasya vṛddher grahaṇaṃ /  Vin_17.504 / vāditreṇaitadvādyamānena sār[d]vanyena ca mahatā sa[t]kāreṇa nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam*

Vin_17.505 / udghoṣaṇaṃ rathyāvīthica[phva?  ] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti bhujādāvāropitasya [65a2] hastiskandhe cha[tra]dhvajapatākāparivṛtasya
Vin_17.507 / dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
Vin_17.509 / anumānakaraṇam /  Vin_17.510 / ābharaṇapratiyuktir utsṛjya pādābharaṇaṃ karṇapūraṃ ca /  Vin_17.511 / gandhārgadadānam* /  Vin_17.512 / śivika kāyām vā hiṇḍanam* /
Vin_17.517 / abhisārasya niḥśritais taruṇavṛddheś ca nayanam* /
Vin_17.519 / pālaśamudgakasya rathe karaṇaṃ gandhasamu[dga]kena samvidhānam* /
Vin_17.521 / samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye maṇḍanāpanamanam* /
Vin_2.2684 / dharmaśravaṇaṃ [40b6] kuryuḥ niśāyām* /  Vin_2.2685 / aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāñ ca /
Vin_2.2687 / nādhyeṣyamāṇo sya bhāṣaṇārthaṃ na pratīccheta /
Vin_2.2688 / aśaktyādāv adhyeṣakaṃ saṃjñapayet* /  Vin_2.2689 / asati bhāṣaṇake paripāṭikayot*smārya bhāṣeran* /
Vin_2.2696 / muhūrttaṃ sthaviro gregataṃ tūṣṇīm āga yyātra dharmaṃ bhāṣetānyam vādhīcched vada bhikṣo dharmaṃ
Vin_2.2699 / gṛhiṇām a[41a2]trāgatānāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt* /
Vin_2.2701 / na parṣadam ādāya deśako gacchet* /
Vin_2.2702 / gatām enāṃ dharmamukhe niveśayet* /  Vin_2.2703 / sagauravaḥ sapratīśo nīcacitto vagāhet* /
Vin_2.2720 / vihārasvāmidevatārthañ ca gāthābhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ niyogasya vacanaṃ /
Vin_2.2722 / adya śuklapakṣasya pratipad vihārasvāmino vihāradevatānāṃ cārthāya gāthāṃ bhā<<ṣa>>dhvam iti /
Vin_2.2723 / vihārasvāmyupanimantraṇavacanaṃ /  Vin_2.2724 / evaṃ nāma dānapati śvo bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktenopanimantrayate taṃ bhadanta kalyā[41a5]ṇaiḥ manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti /
Vin_6.102 / apragamo mṛtakālasvatvasaṃpādane dhaninaḥ /  Vin_6.103 / pragamo gṛhasthasya /  Vin_6.104 / niryātya gṛhiṇi mṛte putradārasya yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ /
Vin_6.108 / sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /  Vin_6.109 / mahāraṅgasya ca /
Vin_6.114 / dhvajārthaṃ [46b2] tadvaṃśānāṃ /  Vin_6.115 / yaṣṭīnāñ ca tadyogyānām /
Vin_6.118 / yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā
Vin_6.235 / dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
Vin_6.238 / yasya tad pānīyaṃ tam uddiśya /  Vin_6.239 / aparāṃ ca devatāṃ /
Vin_6.240 / vāsasya tridaṇḍakam /  Vin_6.241 / dhārayet kāntārikāyāṃ /
Vin_6.242 / tatpramāṇamadhyardhaṃ śatam upādāya hastānām āśatāt /
Vin_8.112 / na praduṣṭena cikitsayet /  Vin_8.113 / na rātrir abhyavahāre vicikitsāyām apratirūpā /  Vin_8.114 / anāśaṃkyam atrāpratigrāhitasannihitayor akalpikatvam /
Vin_8.115 / pānaṃ vicikitsāyai dhūpavartteḥ [51a6] netrikayāsya sampattiḥ /
Vin_8.117 / dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
Vin_8.118 / sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /  Vin_8.119 / nāgadantake cīvaravaṃśe vā tasyā sthāpanam /
Vin_8.121 / karaṇaṃ nastaḥ karmaṇaḥ /  Vin_8.122 / nastakaraṇe nāsyasaṃpattiḥ /
Vin_8.125 / pratiseve[51b1]tāmanāṃsaṃ bhaiṣajyārthe /  Vin_8.126 / bhuktyai tasyāsaktavata upāyaḥ /
Vin_8.129 / apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
Vin_8.133 / na vyāghraśeṣam /  Vin_8.134 / na hastyaśvanāgānām /  Vin_8.135 / [51b2] naikakhurasṛgālamrkaṭakākeṭakakākagṛ(d)

tgt_original: མིག་གཅིག་པ་དང་། ཝ་དང་། སྤྲེའུ་དང་། ཤིང་རྟ་མོ་དང་། བྱ་རོག་དང་། བྱ་རྒོད་དང་། ཆུ་སྐྱར་དང་། ཁྱི་དང་། བྱ་ཁྲ་དང་། འུག་པ་དང་། དེ་དག་ལས་གཞན་བའི་བྱ་མི་རོ་ཟ་བ་དག་དང་།

src_original: Vin_8.245 / [52b3] śocanam asaṃbhave jalasya dadhyādimaṇḍena pādayoḥ /  Vin_8.246 / niṣadanaṃ piṇḍake /
Vin_8.249 / pramī lanam ante /  Vin_8.250 / karaṇaṃ prābhūtye pāṭikānekatvasya /  Vin_8.251 / śatapaṃcakaśaḥ /
Vin_8.255 / yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
Vin_8.256 / niṣadeyuḥ dvitrāvarjāṃ yatheṣṭam atra bhikṣuṇyāḥ /
Vin_8.274 / bhogaś ca vinipātanaṃ śraddh[ā]deyasya /  Vin_8.275 / māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam /
Vin_8.276 / ālopapiṇḍāṃ sthāpayet /  Vin_8.277 / avyavacchidya bhokāram /
Vin_8.280 / na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /  Vin_8.281 / naivāsikānāṃ balidānam /  Vin_8.282 / tatkalpānugatyā pūrvāhvādau /

Vin_2.2109 / nāvadhyānaprekṣyantarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayet* /  Vin_2.2110 / na sāmiṣeṇa pāṇinodakasthālakaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt* /  Vin_2.2111 / [34a4] na sāmiṣeṇodakenāntarikaṃ bhikṣuṃ siñcet* /  Vin_2.2112 / naitad antargṛhe chorayed anavalokya gṛhapatiṃ /
Vin_2.2114 / triḥ prakṣālya pātramārṣabhir gāthābhir abhimantrapātrodakaṃ dadyāt* /

Vin_2.2118 / na prapātena prāgbhāreṇa na catuspathe /  Vin_2.2119 / [34a5] nānuśrotonena nadyāhāryahāriṇyāḥ pānīyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt* /  Vin_2.2120 / prāg uccāraprasrāvād aglānāya /  Vin_2.2121 / tatrāglānaḥ /
Vin_2.2122 / notthito niṣaṇṇāya dharmaṃ deśayet* /  Vin_2.2123 / na niṣaṇṇo nipannāya /  Vin_2.2124 / na nīcatarāsane niṣaṇṇa uccatarake niṣaṇṇāya /
